document.full_text: a crowd of about 30 people gathered to welcome animal kingdom, winner of the kentucky derby, to fair hill on tuesday.  the group was a mix of fair hill horsemen, fans and local news media.
document.title: the rail: warm welcome for animal kingdom at fair hill
lines_and_colors: a crowd of about 30 people gathered to welcome animal kingdom, winner of the kentucky derby, to fair hill on tuesday.  the group was a mix of fair hill horsemen, fans and local news media.
